articles.author: Stephen Morris
articles.title: HSBC shareholders reject Ping An-backed split proposal at AGM - Financial Times
articles.description: Special resolutions demanding regular review of bank’s structure and a guaranteed dividend are defeated
articles.content:
HSBCs shareholders voted against a proposal backed by its biggest investor Ping An to split up the sprawling global lender, in a victory for chair Mark Tucker at the banks annual meeting on Friday.
